name: gorest-users-tests
description: Tests for GoREST **Users** API focusing on happy-path, negative, pagination (strict), boundary, and error-message quality.

scripts.test:api: newman run "postman/collection/GoREST Users Tests.postman_collection.json" -e "postman/env/GoREST Local.secret.json" -r cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/newman.html --color on
